tool_description: This api is available to fetch all departments and cities in France and also to fetch a specific city or department using a postal code (city/department) or a name (city/department)
name: France-departments-cities-API
title: France-departments-cities-API

api_list.name: Fetch single city in France with a postalCode search query
api_list.description: Search for a specific city with a postalCode query for example "75001" is the postal code of paris 1er
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/code/75001"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/code/{postalcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch single city in France with a name search query
api_list.description: Search for a specific city with a name parameter for example "paris" it will fetch all the cities in France with the name paris with all the arrondissements
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/name/paris"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/name/{label}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch single department in France with a search name query
api_list.description: This api allow you to fetch a specific department in France using a query name for example "paris"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com/departments/name/paris"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "france-departments-cities-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fetch single department in France with a postal code param

api_list.name: Fetch all cities in France
